content: This story is about a lot of things; demise of air travel, the rise of incivility, and a host of other things that other commenters have well noted. The brutality is incredible and should never happen to anyone no matter their station in life. Corporate policy at UA is absurd. But inequality? The man is a doctor, not a pauper. I guess when you are a hammer everything looks like a nail. Do better thinking before commenting those thoughts to any paper, but certainly never publish before thinking.
